title: Hello World
text: aaaaaaaaWelcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 想修改下文章格式，发现简书上只有新发表的文章才能使用MarkDown语法，大家有什么好的建议没，求推荐。你的主题，和名字就修改成功了 [test] [] [https://www.baidu.com] [baidu]1code snippet
